title: (x) Journal Archive logo - Charcoal {Nicolai}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=journal_archive_logo.gif)

Anyone know what this is?  
It’s for a Japan Science and Technology Agency website that is going to open tomorrow.

Also, is it just me or is the tracking too loose (e.g. around the “o” and between “ve”)?

Thanks.
author: tomdonahue

comments.content: Character spacing does need sorting out. Subjective of course - but would benefit from 10 minutes careful fiddling.

“Coming soon!” is Optima Bold, just in case you needed that too.

- Lex
Journal @ archive is Font Bureau’s [Truth Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329195927/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/TruthFB/styles) and I believe the skewed the @ sign.

Thanks, Lex and Miss Tiffany.  
I feel better now, after asking about a system font. :)
